column3: PURPOSE (should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)
PROGRAMS THAT ARE FOR BARE MINIMUM FUNCTION
"allows your computer to access dos-like filesystems."
"is for the window manager. Replaces normal status command."
"is a tray icon for pulse audio."
"provides a way for non-privileged processes to talk to privileged ones."
PROGRAMS THAT ARE TOOLS - CLEAR INPUT TO CLEAR OUTPUT
"can record and splice video and audio on the command line."
"is for creating and maniputating partition tables."
"can download videos or playlists from YouTube when given a link."
"prints system information in a pleasing way."
"is for listening to and exploring music."
"is for creating and editing images. Similar to paint.NET."
"allows for trashing files and removing them later when they aren't needed."
"is a music player daemon for music."
PROGRAMS THAT ARE FOR SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT
"is for Node.js development. Faster than npm."
PROGRAMS THAT ARE JUST FOR FUN
"sends a steam locomotive across the terminal."
"allows you to change many things in memory (i.e. cheat engine)."
"grows a nice looking bonsai tree in the terminal."
